pages.text: The upgrades will check any not fully grown crops/blocks above the top side of the pedestal and then, It will use the bone meal from the pedestal onto the crops in a radius which the blocks aren't fully grown yet (also works on saplings).$(br2)If bone meal isnt available, it will randomly tick the farmland block causeing crops to grow slightly faster then normal.$(br)The upgrade can be enchanted with pedestal range and pedestal speed enchantments to increase it's range and speed respectively.
